mapper.select: SELECT e.department_no , d.edms_doc_no , d.title , e.id , d.submit_dt FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE e.id = #{id} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC

SELECT e.department_no , d.edms_doc_no , d.title , e.id , d.submit_dt , CASE WHEN d.current_approver_id = #{userId} THEN '결재수신' ELSE d.approval_status END AS approval_status , d.important , d.approval_dt FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE d.approval_status = #{approvalStatus} AND e.id = #{userId} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC

SELECT e.department_no, d.edms_doc_no, d.title, e.id, d.submit_dt, d.important FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE e.department_no = #{departmentNo} AND (d.important = 'false' OR d.important IS NULL) ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC

SELECT e.department_no , d.edms_doc_no , d.title , e.id , d.submit_dt , d.approval_status , d.important FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE d.approval_status = '결재완료' AND e.department_no = #{departmentNo} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC

SELECT e.department_no , d.edms_doc_no , d.title , e.id , d.submit_dt , d.important FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE d.important = #{important} AND e.department_no = #{departmentNo} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC
